name: Church Valley Road Area Wide Treatment ITP
template name: Church Valley Road Area Wide Treatment ITP

name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Record TNZ/M4 Test Document
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm material meets M4 Crushing resistance test
Frequency - 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Record NZS 3122
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm material as per NZS 3122
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Measure temperature
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum ambient air temp.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Average usage test
Acceptance Criteria - Target = 2.4kg/m2,Within ±0.5km/m² of the specified rate
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Maximum time period from mixing to primary compaction
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cut depth
Frequency - At both ends of cut & every 200m
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Join Overlap
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Particle Breakdown
Acceptance Criteria - Well mixed material with acceptable particle size distribution
Frequency - within the first 20m of each run, and where ever material changes
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - String line & survey
Acceptance Criteria - As per the design
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - NDM - Maximum Dry Density & Degree of Saturation (DOS)
Frequency - 5 tests per homogeneous lot of up to 1000m2 of laid pavement
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Visual inspection, Check string records, straight edge
Acceptance Criteria - No ponding if crossfall > 1% , Finished crossfall between any 2 points more than 2m apart transverse to centreline ±0.5% of design
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Ride quality & Mosaic surface
Frequency - 1 ride test for each lane following Basecourse completion prior to surfacing
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Slope, Compaction & Soil support
Acceptance Criteria - Consistent slope, Vehicles can drive on shoulders without becoming stuck
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - B Beam
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Levelling
Acceptance Criteria - 3m Straight edge deviation 10mm deviation
16 - Ready for sealing (Surface to seal texture)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Mosaic surface
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Verify m2 treated vs litres used
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Marker pegs, sign & marking
Acceptance Criteria - Replaced in same position/height unless specified otherwise
Acceptance Criteria - All relevant as built information collected
